=EF=BB=BF  
Sc=
ience people will tell you there  is no astral. The term "Astral" was 
coin=
ed by the first people who  experienced this realm. But all words were 
coi=
ned. Even words such as dog  or cat. 
 
Also, subconscious means below cons=
cious  or not conscious. So it isn't 
incorrect, though maybe some scholarl=
y types  will tell you it isn't proper. 
Again, all words were coined.
 
Yo=
u have to remember that colleges and  schools are mostly made up by 
people=
, people who think only scientifically. I  know-not all people in colleges =

think this way, but that is what learning  institutions are based on. They=
 
reject any term they can't grasp or understand  under a microscope.
 
All=
 this is besides the point  though.

The word is really unconscious=
, the word sub. was coined by  lay people, 
but any psychologist will tell =
us the word to use is unconscious  because it 
is the correct term, Psych's=
 make a joke about us  lay  people using the word 
subconscious to mean the=
 same thing,  I had 12  credits toward my PhD but, 
til ran out of money.  =
I understand  what you are saying though, the word 
"astral" is also a made=
 up word, as is  many of the new terms out there like 
"ascended master" an=
d "channel" I think  they refer to guide and medium, 
respectively. I
